column4: if i have a stalled application, how do i kill it, if i dont know the process name? ive got a stuck thunar session which i cant close, but ps aux |grep thunar   brings up nothing
right click on your panel, select add to panel, the fidn 'Crash Handler' add it,then click on the new icon then on the crashed app
there's nothing stopping your driver from lying about its MAC address... most NIC drivers these days allow you to just specify what MAC address it'll tell the network it has
